unnormalised: Toh, tumi finally graduate zale? Parabens! Va mhaje nani mhanta te porim, “*Aakhir kar liya!*” Tea chai ani Maggi-n bhorlelya der ratri, porikshek zaap divpak… tem soglle favo aslem, sory? Bare, thode thode. To GPA ugddaita? Ho, to respectable 7.5 ani eka “*beta, Sharma ji ka beta*” favo 9.8 madhe kite kite tho asat? Frame kor! Seriously, ek fancy frame ghe. Tem proof asa ki tumi Indian education system jivont ravle, ani Everest choddun gellyapeksha anik prabhavi.
normalised: Te, tunvum nimannem padvi ghetli? Parabens! Vo mazi nani mhunta tashi, "*Aakhir kar liya!*" Tea chaha ani Maggi haddlelea der ratri, parikshekhatir thoslelim... te soglle mullyache asle, bare? Bare, thoddeshem. To G-P-A ugddaita? Haa, to samanya sat point panch ani "*beta, Sharma ji ka beta*" yogya nau point atth madli kiteim tari? Tanko frame kara! Gambhirpanan, ek shringar kel'li frame ghe. Tumhi Bharoti shikshan paddatik jivachem rakhle, hem te siddh karta, Everest chervun voddlo ani ashcharyakarak!

unnormalised: Certificategeli baat korta, mhozo cousin, tachi godd sockan sood kor, tanen eka school drawing competition-iche participation certificate frame kele. Tannem sanglle ki tem “portfolio building” asle. Genius! Toh tumchi inter-college debate jinkli ti sodun kaad, ani best project award (zaleaari ti Wikipedia entry asletri chalu) ani tankam tanchi sun-light moment di. After all, te “Certificate of Excellence in Basket Weaving” tumkam LinkedIn-aache uprant zai asleli edge asunk xakta. Va at least, tea uprant famly-ichem gathering-ant tem bore story asunk xakta.
normalised: Pramanpatranche vicharun, mazyen bhau, to deiv diun, tanen eka shallechea chitra spordhentlean thamgevn ghetlelem pramanpatra frame korun dovornem. Tenen mhunlem tem "*portfolio building.*" Budhdhimatta! Tech khatir tenka inter-college vadvadichin jitlelean ani tumchen bore prakalpache purskar (jarya hem Wikipedia lekha thoden bodlun kelam) tanko dhupanth davara. Nimane, hem "*Certificate of Excellence in Basket Weaving*" tumka LinkedIn-anth thodde faidekarak asanchem. Vo kamath, fuddara family get-togetharak ek bore story kartelim.

unnormalised: Ani te degrees-anchem kite? Tier-3 college-ntlem B.Tech? Kitem tari obsecure-antlem M.A.? Tem tumchem asa! Ugddaita tem tumi tyaan particular brutal thermodynamics-ichem exam aced kelam ek satyache noodle-anchem jivont ravun? Tem resilience-ichem story asa, mhoje mitr! Tumchea resume-nt ghala ki "Master of Resourcefulness Under Extreme Pressure". Tem borem distelem... probably.
normalised: Ani te padvio sambhandith kitem? Tier teen shallethlean B-Tech? Kitlem tri andhuk M-A? Tanak apnava! Tumchen eka khas brutal thermodynamics parikshentlean instant noodles khuun eka satollethlyan vachun kashi pass zalea? Tem dharyache story, mazyen dost! Tumchen resume-anth "*Master of Resourcefulness Under Extreme Pressure*" mhunon ghala. To bore distelim... zaryank.

unnormalised: Punn seriously, tea certificate ani degree-anchim khari kimat kitlem? Tem tumchea learn korpachi, adapt korpachi ani eka diet-acher jivont ravpachi testament asa je eka pigeon-ak jealous korunk xakta. Tem proof asa tumi pressure, deadlines ani eka confusing professor-ache occasional existential crisis handle korunk xakta. Toh, yeah, tankam frame kor, flaunt kor ani maybe tankam coaster porim kite kite veli vapra. Punn original harunk naka. Tumkam te next verification process-ak zai asat.
normalised: Pun gambhirpanan, te praman patran ani padvi che khara mol? Te tumchen shikovpachen, bodlupachen ani ek kabutor jevonuch jivachem rakhpachi takat asat. Te siddh karta ki tumka dabav, akhiri tarikh ani kitte tari dollyavo profesoran karn aillem astitvache sankat sambhallem jatam. Tech khatir, tanko frame kara, dikhva ani kiteim vellar tanko coaster karke vapra. Pun asli naksha voo. Tumka fuddaril verification procrask te zai asta.

unnormalised: Ultimately, kite tari IIM-A-ntlem PhD va eka local computer center-antle data entry-ntlem diploma aslem tarri, tumchem mastak unch dori. Tumchya sanghatana zata. Atam, duniyak jinkhtek votuk va at least ek decent promotion gheuk. Ani tem LinkedIn profile-nt tea frame-kortat tea achievements-amni update karunk naka visrum. *All the best!*
normalised: Nimane, hem I-I-M-A anlean P-h-D asa voo eka thanik computer centeranlean data entrynth diploma, tumchen dokem ukhlana ubam rava. Tummim to kamayla. Ata, fuddara vellak samsar jita voo kamath ek bore padvi ghe. Ani Linkedin profile-anth nvem frame kelolim purnata ghala dhon voo. *All the best!*
